::Sulaco::

    As true to the programming the autoguns shot the mountian c=
ontaining the Sulaco. The rocks around the entrance crumbled. There was no =
way in and no way out.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Rudra656@aol=
.com 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, March 05, 2001 10:05 AM=

  Subject: Re: Here it is. Good-Bye Destrons.


  OOC: The Destrons will a=
lways be yours Dachande but I don't think they should 
  stop existing duri=
ng your absence.

  ::Cygnar::
      He received the message from Magmatron=
.  He was still looking for 
  Optimus.  He had failed.  He was unworthy.  =
He flew to the base but did not 
  enter.  He felt that staying here was a =
fitting punishment.  He would rebuild 
  the Destrons so that if Magmatron =
ever returned he would find them better 
  than when he left.  He circled o=
ver the base waiting to see if anyone else 
  would stay.

        Yahoo! G=
roups Sponsor 
       
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to t=
he Yahoo! Terms of Service.
